channel.title: [317] Help For Adding Commands In Client.java [317]
channel.description:
Hey guys! i really need help with this. ive tried my own ways to do it. but anyways on to the problem. Im coding a 317, And theres more commands in 317. That have to be changed to your name. Example:
[code]if (command.startsWith("interface") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Owner Kid")) {[/code]
I want to know how to put in the name where "owner kid" is. I wanna know how to put 2 names. !The Correct Way! I tried it my way. And i got error's when i compiled. Please help?

item.title: [317] Help For Adding Commands In Client.java [317]
item.dc:creator: @Rigsy Rigsy
item.description:
@Rigsy wrote:

[quote=“calebsomthing, post:2, topic:374088”]if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cyrax”)) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ryan”))))

like that. i cbf to put it in code tho sorry m8.

oh i’m sorry i left one thing out. basically delete ownerkid’s name. and put the account your useing like lets say you made your self owner in game on account “noob” then you would put “noob” where owner kid is.[/quote]

Thanks so much dude.
I was looking for this soo much, I tried everything. Ill remember this. Rep+

Read full topic
item.source: [317] Help For Adding Commands In Client.java [317]

item.title: [317] Help For Adding Commands In Client.java [317]
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“demote”) && ((playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“cyrax”)) || (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“ryan”))))

like that. i cbf to put it in code tho sorry m8.

oh i’m sorry i left one thing out. basically delete ownerkid’s name. and put the account your useing like lets say you made your self owner in game on account “noob” then you would put “noob” where owner kid is.

Read full topic
